title: Fork, ca. 1700–1800
dimensions: L x W: 12.7 x 1 cm (5 x 3/8 in.)
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Three curved tines, curved shoulders, baluster-shaped neck flaring in the middle. Octagonal brass ferrule, faceted agate handle with rounded top.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fork, ca. 1700–1800.
ca. 1700–1800. steel, brass, agate. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-114.
